transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride in me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am bigger than a scooter.
👪 I can carry a family.
🚦 You see lots of me in the city.

transport.question: I go choo-choo and travel on tracks. I carry many people and things. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I have a long line of cars attached.
💨 I used to use steam, but now some use electricity.
🌎 I can travel very far across the land.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am faster than a car.
☁️ You can see me high in the clouds.
💺 People sit inside me during the flight.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or cargo across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I am bigger than a canoe.
🌊 I travel on oceans, lakes, and rivers.
🚢 Pirates might sail on me (but probably not!).

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to push me forward. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need a helmet when you ride me.
🍃 I am good for the environment and exercise.
🔔 Some have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I help people travel under the city. I'm like a train but underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You need to go down stairs or an elevator to get to me.
🗺️ I can help you navigate a big city quickly.
💡 I am often brightly lit inside.

transport.question: I am very fast and can go to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Astronauts ride inside me.
🌕 I can travel to the moon.
🔥 I leave a trail of fire behind me.

transport.question: I carry many people around town and stop at designated places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 You often wait for me at a bus stop.
🛑 I open my doors to let people get on and off.
💰 You often need to pay to ride me.

transport.question: I can fly but I have big spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I am sometimes used for rescues.
⛰️ I can land in places other airplanes can't.

transport.question: I am a car for hire and I take you where you want to go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I often have a light on top.
📍 You can call me or find me at a taxi stand.
🧭 The driver knows the city well.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I help make milk for you to drink.
☀️ I need sunshine and water to grow.
🐄 Animals graze on me in a field.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and smell sweet. Bees love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I can be many different colors.
🐝 I help bees make honey.
🌷 People like to give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make paper from me.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👁️ I'm good for your eyes!
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I am a plant that can be very tall and have yellow kernels that you can eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in fields.
🍿 You can make popcorn out of me.
🐶 Animals also like to eat me.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns and beautiful flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often red, pink or white.
🌹 People give me as a sign of love.
🧤 You need gloves to handle me.

plant.question: I am a big, round fruit that is green on the outside and red on the inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy!
⛱️ People like to eat me in the summertime.
🫘 My seeds are small and black.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. You can grind me to make flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am used to make bread.
🚜 Farmers grow me in big fields.
🦉 Some birds eat me.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am a good source of vitamins.
🧀 You can eat me with cheese.
🥗 You can put me in salads.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that grows in the desert and can store a lot of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I live in dry places.
🌵 Some of me have beautiful flowers.
💧 I store water inside me.
